item.description:
This date is tentative. If it is cold or wet, the rain date is the day after (Thursday). I love Oleana's patio but it is very hard to get into at peak dining hours. They recommended 5:30 pm, but I will instead show up at 6:30 and get us a table at ca. 7:30. If worse comes to worst, we'll just eat indoors.

Because of all this planning, please don't sign up and then cancel last-minute. On the other hand, you can always call me last-minute to see if there's room.

It's okay to park in the health club parking lot across the street.

For more info on Oleana, see:
http://www.oleanarest...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for me or the "Meetup group".
item.why: Oleana is one of the best restaurants in Cambridge. Its garden patio is magical on a warm summer night. Last summer they had a couple of musicians (oud (guitar) & dabouka (tabla)) putting out an eery, enticing background music.
item.name: Oleana patio
